description: TrialTestCase slipped back in in the merges.  It specifically breaks running tests with ./run_tests.sh nova.tests.test_cloud for example.  There was a change to networks_create that needs to be put back into TestCase and TrialTestCase can be removed again.
title: TrialTestCase breaks running individual tests

comments.content: TrialTestCase slipped back in in the merges.  It specifically breaks running tests with ./run_tests.sh nova.tests.test_cloud for example.  There was a change to networks_create that needs to be put back into TestCase and TrialTestCase can be removed again.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
